p:
CHIKV (CHIKV 06.21; accession number AM258992) isolated in 2005 from a patient on La Reunion, belongs to the East-Central-South African (ECSA) lineage and contains the E1-A226V mutation
55 . DENV-1 (1806; accession number EU482591) was obtained in 2010 from an autochthonous case in Nice, France
35 . ZIKV (ZIKV PE243; accession number KX197192) isolated from a patient in Recife (Brazil) in 2015 belongs to the Asian genotype
56 . Viral stocks were prepared after several passages of the isolate onto C6/36 cells for CHIKV and DENV, and Vero cells for ZIKV.
